revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Rocket Game Corner |image = [[File:Rocket Game Corner.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of the Rocket Game Corner. |tokens = 625 |location = Celadon City }} The '''Rocket Game Corner''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 5,820 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !!
